welcome_message_body: Welcome to Oshawa, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, vibrant arts scene, and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Oshawa has to offer during your stay.

restaurants.name: Firehouse Subs
restaurants.description: Firehouse Subs is a sandwich spot located in Oshawa.
restaurants.address: 224 Ritson Road North, Oshawa ON L1G 0B2

restaurants.description: Avanti Trattoria is a italian restaurant located in Oshawa.
restaurants.address: 17 King St E (at Simcoe), Oshawa ON L1H 1A8

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Oshawa Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Oshawa Airport is responsible for handling all cargo and freight shipments.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting 'YOO Airport WiFi' and following the prompts.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Buttonville Municipal Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The private aviation terminal at Buttonville Municipal Airport caters to private and corporate aircrafts.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for all travelers.
